## Generalized Additive Models

```{r}
clinical <- read.csv("clinical_data_processed.csv")
str(clinical)
```
```{r}
library(splines)
library(gam)
gam1 <- gam(OS ~ns(age,5) + ns(AFP,5) + hepatitis_HCV_HBV.1 + Diabetes + Personal_history_cancer + tumor_nodul, data = clinical)
plot(gam1, se = TRUE, col="blue")
```

```{r}
summary(gam1)
```
